name: Deactivate an account for a non existing national ID
scenarioId: classpath:features/user/deactivate_user:Deactivate an account for a non existing national ID
methodName: Deactivate an account for a non existing national ID

testSteps.description: Given a client with name "Jhon", surname "Doe", document type "NATIONAL_ID", document "12343532", country "PT"
And there is no client with this document information
When the user deactivation is requested
Then the client's account deactivation is denied

reportData.title: User Deactivation Response
reportData.contents: <404 NOT_FOUND Not Found,RestResponse(message=User Not Found for documents., data=null),[content-type:"application/json", date:"Wed, 25 Dec 2024 14:30:07 GMT", transfer-encoding:"chunked"]>

userStory.narrative:
The Tiny User Bank can at any moment choose to close its account in the Tiny Bank. The user is not deleted from the bank
  data records. It is deactivated to allow future data verification. The user deactivation and user account deactivation
  are done in the same operation.

  **As a** client that has an account at Tiny Bank
  **I want to** request the account deactivation
  **So that I can** end my relationship with the bank

title: Deactivate an account for a non existing national ID

rule.name: When a Tiny Bank client request to deactivate its account, based on the clients national ID the deactivation is done.
